meanings.sent1: The disseverance of the rope was quick and clean.
meanings.sent2: The disseverance of the cake into slices was done carefully.
meanings.sent3: The disseverance of the sandwich caused a comical mess on the table.
meanings.sent4: The disseverance of the clouds revealed a bright blue sky.
meanings.sent5: The disseverance of the puzzle pieces made it easier to solve.
